pages.text: $(li)The Globe is a decoration block with a unique randomly generated to every world seed.$(br)$(li)If you click on a Globe or give it a redstone pulse, it will spin and display your current coordinates.
$(li)It can only obtained buying it from a $(l:patchouli:villagers/wandering_trader)Wandering Trader$(/l) or be found in $(l:patchouli:structures/shipwreck)Shipwreck$(/l).

$(li)It can also interact with $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/comparator)Comparator$(/l)s.$(br)$(li)Those receive a redstone signal that depends on it's current face and a full strength one while it's spinning.
